description:
Stance and Ciele have runners covered from their head to their toes. These ultralight crew socks are a collab between Stance and running hat experts Ciele. Much like Ciele’s hats, the Run C1 crew socks are light, wicking, and great for logging the kilometers.

  • FreshTek™ moisture and odour control uses performance mesh to keep you cool, maximizing airflow and breathability
  • Infiknit™ construction add durability to high-friction areas
  • Anatomical ultralight cushioning adds protection where you need it most
  • Left/right engineered arch support delivers a precise fit
  • Mesh venting panels
  • Seamless toe closure and engineered ankle protection for hotspot- and chafe-free wear
name: Stance Run C1 Crew Socks - Unisex
